name: updateSecurityLevel
description:
Updates the issue security level.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

schemeId.description: The ID of the issue security scheme level belongs to.

levelId.description: The ID of the issue security level to update.

UpdateIssueSecurityLevelDetails.description: Details of issue security scheme level.

description.description: The description of the issue security scheme level.

name.description: The name of the issue security scheme level. Must be unique.
